scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:api && npm run build:client
scripts.docker:up: bash -c '[ ! -f certs/localhost.pem ] && command -v mkcert &> /dev/null && bash scripts/setup-https.sh || mkdir -p certs; docker-compose up -d'
scripts.docker:rebuild: bash -c '[ ! -f certs/localhost.pem ] && command -v mkcert &> /dev/null && bash scripts/setup-https.sh || mkdir -p certs; docker compose down -v && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules api/node_modules server/node_modules shared/node_modules
